gcci.text: At $3.18/hr for H100s, premium pricing signals persistent supply constraints and elevated capex requirements that could limit AI infrastructure deployment to well-capitalized enterprises.

gtpi.text: The $1.25/1M token pricing reflects intense API price wars driving commoditization while forcing providers to optimize model efficiency to maintain thin profit margins.

gagl.text: 120 TWh annual load represents critical grid strain that necessitates accelerated nuclear and renewable adoption to prevent power shortages as AI computing demand escalates.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains buoyant but infrastructure cost inflation and potential regulatory intervention create significant bubble risk that could disrupt sustainable growth trajectories.
